title: Our Indetrendence Day 7/1: Bobby Bonilla Day, Meghan McCain, Movies, NCAA, Ghosts of Tsushima
itunes:title: Our Indetrendence Day 7/1: Bobby Bonilla Day, Meghan McCain, Movies, NCAA, Ghosts of Tsushima
description:
In this edition of Our Indetrendence Day, Jack and Miles discuss Bobby Bonilla Day, Meghan McCain leaving The View, upcoming theatrical releases, NCAA athletes finally cashing in on their likeness, and Ghosts of Tsushima's expansion update.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
